title: List of trolls
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | You feel a lump in the pit of your stomach.***Buckshank bold and Elfinstone, And more than I can mention here, They caused to be built so stout a ship, And unto Iceland they would steer.They launched the ship upon the main, Which bellowed like a wrathful bear; Down to the bottom the vessel sank, A laidly Trold has dragged it there.” -George Borrow, \_Lavengro: The Scholar, the Gypsy, the Priest\_. 1851. |

**Trolls** are huge, lumbering humanoids found throughout [the Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"), tearing apart adventurers with their savage claws. Although there are several varieties with unique features, they all boast powerful melee prowess and frustratingly rapid [regeneration](/Regeneration "Regeneration"). Killing them may produce [troll leather armour](/Troll_leather_armour "Troll leather armour") of varying shades, though all colours work identically.

## Contents

- [1 Troll Types](#Troll_Types)

  - [1.1 Unique Trolls](#Unique_Trolls)
  - [1.2 Retired Trolls](#Retired_Trolls)

- [2 History](#History)

## Troll Types

- T [![Troll.png](/images/f/f3/Troll.png)](/File:Troll.png) **[Troll](/Troll_\(monster\) "Troll (monster)")** - A brute with long claws, slavering fangs, and unnatural regeneration.
- T [![Deep troll.png](/images/d/da/Deep_troll.png)](/File:Deep_troll.png) **[Deep troll](/Deep_troll "Deep troll")** - Cave-dwellers that hunt in packs and are often led by their more magically-inclined brethren.
- T [![Deep troll earth mage.png](/images/4/4e/Deep_troll_earth_mage.png)](/File:Deep_troll_earth_mage.png) **[Deep troll earth mage](/Deep_troll_earth_mage "Deep troll earth mage")** - These geomancers use magic to carve tunnels through the Dungeon and their claws to carve through you.
- T [![Deep troll shaman.png](/images/4/4c/Deep_troll_shaman.png)](/File:Deep_troll_shaman.png) **[Deep troll shaman](/Deep_troll_shaman "Deep troll shaman")** - The leaders of deep troll packs, they enhance their allies' [speed](/Haste "Haste") and [strength](/Might "Might").
- T [![Iron troll.png](/images/6/68/Iron_troll.png)](/File:Iron_troll.png) **[Iron troll](/Iron_troll "Iron troll")** - The largest, slowest, most powerful member of the troll family. Resists [fire](/Fire "Fire") and [cold](/Cold "Cold").

### Unique Trolls

- T [![Pargi.png](/images/6/6e/Pargi.png)](/File:Pargi.png) **[Pargi](/Pargi "Pargi")** - A lithe troll who hides from his more dangerous cousins up in the higher floors of the Dungeon or in [the Sewers](/The_Sewers "The Sewers").
- T [![Snorg.png](/images/e/e8/Snorg.png)](/File:Snorg.png) **[Snorg](/Snorg "Snorg")** - An obese troll who goes berserk on a whim.
- T [![Moon troll.png](/images/8/88/Moon_troll.png)](/File:Moon_troll.png) **[Moon troll](/Moon_troll "Moon troll")** - Found guarding [Lehudib's Moon Base](/Lehudib%27s_Moon_Base "Lehudib's Moon Base"), the bearer of the [moon troll leather armour](/Moon_troll_leather_armour "Moon troll leather armour") is as tough as an iron troll but is faster and capable of firing bolts of [acid](/Acid "Acid").
- T [![Parghit.png](/images/b/ba/Parghit.png)](/File:Parghit.png) **[Parghit](/Parghit "Parghit")** - A ferocious [gold dragon scales](/Gold_dragon_scales "Gold dragon scales")-wearing troll who hits harder and regenerates faster than nearly anything else.

### Retired Trolls

- T [![Rock troll.png](/images/7/72/Rock_troll.png)](/File:Rock_troll.png) **[Rock troll](/Rock_troll "Rock troll")** - Stony-skinned trolls that were tougher but slower than their fleshy brethren.

## History

- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), deep troll shamans and earth magi would drop green troll leather armors.
- Parghit was added in [0.29](/0.29 "0.29").
- Prior to [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), all trolls, including [deep](/Deep_troll "Deep troll") and [iron trolls](/Iron_troll "Iron troll"), dropped only green [armour](/Troll_leather_armour "Troll leather armour").
- In [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), Lehudib's Moon Base featuring the Moon troll was added.
- In [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), [rock trolls](/Rock_troll "Rock troll") were removed, deep troll earth mages and shamans were added.
html:
List of trolls

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
You feel a lump in the pit of your stomach.

Buckshank bold and Elfinstone,
And more than I can mention here,
They caused to be built so stout a ship,
And unto Iceland they would steer.

They launched the ship upon the main,
Which bellowed like a wrathful bear;
Down to the bottom the vessel sank,
A laidly Trold has dragged it there.”
-George Borrow, _Lavengro: The Scholar, the Gypsy, the Priest_. 1851.

Trolls are huge, lumbering humanoids found throughout the Dungeon, tearing apart adventurers with their savage claws. Although there are several varieties with unique features, they all boast powerful melee prowess and frustratingly rapid regeneration. Killing them may produce troll leather armour of varying shades, though all colours work identically.

Contents

  • 1 Troll Types
    • 1.1 Unique Trolls
    • 1.2 Retired Trolls
  • 2 History

Troll Types

  • T Troll - A brute with long claws, slavering fangs, and unnatural regeneration.
  • T Deep troll - Cave-dwellers that hunt in packs and are often led by their more magically-inclined brethren.
  • T Deep troll earth mage - These geomancers use magic to carve tunnels through the Dungeon and their claws to carve through you.
  • T Deep troll shaman - The leaders of deep troll packs, they enhance their allies' speed and strength.
  • T Iron troll - The largest, slowest, most powerful member of the troll family. Resists fire and cold.

Unique Trolls

  • T Pargi - A lithe troll who hides from his more dangerous cousins up in the higher floors of the Dungeon or in the Sewers.
  • T Snorg - An obese troll who goes berserk on a whim.
  • T Moon troll - Found guarding Lehudib's Moon Base, the bearer of the moon troll leather armour is as tough as an iron troll but is faster and capable of firing bolts of acid.
  • T Parghit - A ferocious gold dragon scales-wearing troll who hits harder and regenerates faster than nearly anything else.

Retired Trolls

  • T Rock troll - Stony-skinned trolls that were tougher but slower than their fleshy brethren.

History

  • Prior to 0.31, deep troll shamans and earth magi would drop green troll leather armors.
  • Parghit was added in 0.29.
  • Prior to 0.20, all trolls, including deep and iron trolls, dropped only green armour.
  • In 0.17, Lehudib's Moon Base featuring the Moon troll was added.
  • In 0.12, rock trolls were removed, deep troll earth mages and shamans were added.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=List_of_trolls&oldid=79104"

And more than I can mention here,
They caused to be built so stout a ship,
And unto Iceland they would steer.

-George Borrow, _Lavengro: The Scholar, the Gypsy, the Priest_. 1851.}} '''Trolls''' are huge, lumbering humanoids found throughout [[the Dungeon]], tearing apart adventurers with their savage claws. Although there are several varieties with unique features, they all boast powerful melee prowess and frustratingly rapid [[regeneration]]. Killing them may produce [[troll leather armour]] of varying shades, though all colours work identically. ==Troll Types== *{{Brown|T}} [[File:Troll (monster).png]] '''[[Troll (monster)|Troll]]''' - A brute with long claws, slavering fangs, and unnatural regeneration. *{{monsterlink|Deep troll}} - Cave-dwellers that hunt in packs and are often led by their more magically-inclined brethren. *{{monsterlink|Deep troll earth mage}} - These geomancers use magic to carve tunnels through the Dungeon and their claws to carve through you. *{{monsterlink|Deep troll shaman}} - The leaders of deep troll packs, they enhance their allies' [[Haste|speed]] and [[Might|strength]]. *{{monsterlink|Iron troll}} - The largest, slowest, most powerful member of the troll family. Resists [[fire]] and [[cold]]. ===Unique Trolls=== *{{monsterlink|Pargi}} - A lithe troll who hides from his more dangerous cousins up in the higher floors of the Dungeon or in [[the Sewers]]. *{{monsterlink|Snorg}} - An obese troll who goes berserk on a whim. *{{monsterlink|Moon troll}} - Found guarding [[Lehudib's Moon Base]], the bearer of the [[moon troll leather armour]] is as tough as an iron troll but is faster and capable of firing bolts of [[acid]]. *{{monsterlink|Parghit}} - A ferocious [[gold dragon scales]]-wearing troll who hits harder and regenerates faster than nearly anything else. ===Retired Trolls=== *{{monsterlink|Rock troll}} - Stony-skinned trolls that were tougher but slower than their fleshy brethren. ==History== *Prior to [[0.31]], deep troll shamans and earth magi would drop green troll leather armors. *Parghit was added in [[0.29]]. *Prior to [[0.20]], all trolls, including [[deep troll|deep]] and [[iron troll]]s, dropped only green [[troll leather armour|armour]]. *In [[0.17]], Lehudib's Moon Base featuring the Moon troll was added. *In [[0.12]], [[rock troll]]s were removed, deep troll earth mages and shamans were added.
